availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Mitchell (Bracken County, Kentucky, boot and shoe dealer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, boot and shoe dealer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Matthews Mitchell in Bracken County on March 20, 1860. Boot and shoe dealer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Brooksville, p. 146.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bracken County Marriages, Film #000344097, p. 300 of 403 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
